mapper.select: SELECT SPS.s_stock_id, SPS.prod_id, SPS.opt_id1, SPS.opt_id2, SPS.opt_id3, SPS.opt_id4, SPS.opt_id5, SPS.stock FROM SELLER_PROD_STOCK SPS WHERE SPS.prod_id = #{prod_id}
SELECT s.s_stock_id, s.stock, p.prod_added_date, p.prod_price FROM SELLER_PROD_STOCK s JOIN PROD p ON s.prod_id = p.prod_id WHERE p.member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SELLER_PROD_STOCK(s_stock_id, stock, total, prod_id, opt_id1, opt_id2, opt_id3, opt_id4, opt_id5) VALUES(#{s_stock_id}, #{stock}, #{total}, #{prod_id}, #{opt_id1}, #{opt_id2}, #{opt_id3}, #{opt_id4}, #{opt_id5})
mapper.update: UPDATE SELLER_PROD_STOCK SET stock = #{stock}, total = #{total}, prod_id = #{prod_id}, opt_id1 = #{opt_id1}, opt_id2 = #{opt_id2}, opt_id3 = #{opt_id3}, opt_id4 = #{opt_id4}, opt_id5 = #{opt_id5} WHERE s_stock_id = #{s_stock_id}
